title: 6 Nations summaries
text: March 17, 2018 / 2:25 PM / Updated an hour ago UPDATE 3-6 Nations summaries Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Mar 17 (OPTA) - summaries from the 6 Nations matches on Saturday Italy (17) 27 Tries: Allan (13,44), Minozzi (20) Conversions: Allan (14,21,45) Penalties: Allan (6,75) Scotland (12) 29 Tries: Brown (9), Barclay (24), Maitland (60), Hogg (70) Conversions: Laidlaw (25,61,71) Penalties: Laidlaw (78) Referee: Pascal Gauzère England (5) 15 Tries: Daly (31,64), May (81) Ireland (21) 24 Tries: Ringrose (5), Stander (23), Stockdale (41) Conversions: Sexton (6,23), Carbery (44) Penalties: Murray (59) Yellow cards: O'Mahony (28) Referee: Angus Gardner Wales (14) 14 Tries: Williams (3) Penalties: Halfpenny (9,15,31) France (10) 13 Tries: Fickou (20) Conversions: Machenaud (21) Penalties: Machenaud (48) Drop Goals: Trinh-Duc (3) Referee: Ben O'keeffe
